title: BONUS: BobbyCast #187 - Famous Songs that Peaked At No. 2 and the Songs That Kept Them Out
itunes:title: BONUS: BobbyCast #187 - Famous Songs that Peaked At No. 2 and the Songs That Kept Them Out
description:
This week, Bobby and Mike talk about some of the biggest songs in COUNTRY AND POP that famously peaked at No. 2. They were so close to being no. 1...but there was either a song that was just dominating in front of them...or a song that shot up behind them to take no. 1. Dustin Lynch was recently in and talked about Cowboys in Angels peaking at No.2 behind Jason Aldean’s “Take A Little Ride”. Also songs from Elvis, Sam Hunt, Luke Bryan and more. Plus Bobby talks about the famous rap battle scene from 8 Mile (note: he plays the clip from the movie and there is some language!). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
